(Background: Still an issue for Style Linking in MS Word for Mac. Tested Sept. 2018)

ZERO WIDTH SPACE advance width should be 0

Advance width is '0'

Error

Noto Sans Sinhala SemCond Regular (NotoSansSinhalaUI-SemiCondensed.ttf)

cmap

FEFF

ZERO WIDTH NO-BREAK SPACE: Missing FEFF in cmap table.

Required for Monotype library. Please add unicode FEFF. Custom work refer to spec.

Pass

Noto Sans Sinhala SemCond Regular (NotoSansSinhalaUI-SemiCondensed.ttf)

cmap

00AD

Soft hyphen 00AD in cmap table.

Soft hyphen is often used in web and in professional print publishing software like Adobe InDesign.

Pass

Noto Sans Sinhala SemCond Regular (NotoSansSinhalaUI-SemiCondensed.ttf)

hmtx

Index 3 and 627

Advance width of nonbreakingspace (uni00A0) should match the space (uni0020) width.

OK: Advance width nonbreakingspace (uni00A0) does match the space (uni0020) width:
448 = 448

Info

uni2009

Advance width of 'thinspace' (uni2009) should be smaller than the width of space (uni0020).

Can not check, because no uni2009 in this font.

Nodes Close to Zones (CFF)

Info

Noto Sans Sinhala SemCond Thin Regular (NotoSansSinhalaUI-SemiCondensedThin.ttf)

CFF

Alignment Zones

Check if nodes are close to a zone, but not in or touching it.

This is a TTF, but this test is only for CFF fonts.

Info

'sfthyphen.sinh' (uni00AD) (ID 628)

Should not be Composite (CFF)

Should not be Composite (CFF)

Info

Noto Sans Sinhala SemCond Thin Regular (NotoSansSinhalaUI-SemiCondensedThin.ttf)

CFF

Composite

CFF font should not have any composite.

OS/2

useTypoMetrics

If the hhea metrics match the usWin metrics, it does not matter what the sTypo metrics are the fsSelection useTypoMetrics flag should be False.

OK: fsSelection useTypoMetrics flag should be False and is False.

Pass

Noto Sans Sinhala SemCond Thin Regular (NotoSansSinhalaUI-SemiCondensedThin.ttf)

name and OS/2

MS and Mac NID 21/22 + WWS

If MS and Mac NID 21 and 22 is not set, 'OS/2' fsSelection flag for WWS should be True.

OK: Mac/Mac NID 21/22 is not set and 'OS/2' fsSelection flag for WWS is True.

Pass

Noto Sans Sinhala SemCond Thin Regular (NotoSansSinhalaUI-SemiCondensedThin.ttf)

OS/2

italic flag

'OS/2' fsSelection italic flag should match the 'head' macStyle italic flag. They should be the same.

OK: They are the same.'OS/2' fsSelection italic flag is False and 'head' macStyle italic flag is False.

Pass

Noto Sans Sinhala SemCond Thin Regular (NotoSansSinhalaUI-SemiCondensedThin.ttf)

OS/2

Panose Normal

OK: 'OS/2' panose array form flag is a 'Normal' entry.

Pass

Noto Sans Sinhala SemCond Thin Regular (NotoSansSinhalaUI-SemiCondensedThin.ttf)

'OS/2' usFirstCharIndex should be 0x0000

OK: 'OS/2' usFirstCharIndex is 0x0000.

Pass

Noto Sans Sinhala SemCond Bold (NotoSansSinhalaUI-SemiCondensedBold.ttf)

OS/2

Embedding Level

For library fonts embedding level should be 'Preview & Print Embedding'.

Embedding Level is 'Embedding Level = Installable Embedding'. If custom font please check against job spec.

Info

Noto Sans Sinhala SemCond Bold (NotoSansSinhalaUI-SemiCondensedBold.ttf)

embedding level: Embedding Level = Installable Embedding
no subsetting flag: False
bitmap embedding only flag: False

Pass

Noto Sans Sinhala SemCond ExtBd Regular (NotoSansSinhalaUI-SemiCondensedExtraBold.ttf)

OS/2

table version 4.

'OS/2' table version should be 4.

OK: 'OS/2' table version is: 4.

Pass

Noto Sans Sinhala SemCond ExtBd Regular (NotoSansSinhalaUI-SemiCondensedExtraBold.ttf)

OS/2

useTypoMetrics

If the hhea metrics match the usWin metrics, it does not matter what the sTypo metrics are the fsSelection useTypoMetrics flag should be False.

OK: fsSelection useTypoMetrics flag should be False and is False.

Pass

Noto Sans Sinhala SemCond ExtBd Regular (NotoSansSinhalaUI-SemiCondensedExtraBold.ttf)

name and OS/2

MS and Mac NID 21/22 + WWS

If MS and Mac NID 21 and 22 is not set, 'OS/2' fsSelection flag for WWS should be True.

OK: Mac/Mac NID 21/22 is not set and 'OS/2' fsSelection flag for WWS is True.

Pass

Noto Sans Sinhala SemCond ExtBd Regular (NotoSansSinhalaUI-SemiCondensedExtraBold.ttf)

OS/2

italic flag

'OS/2' fsSelection italic flag should match the 'head' macStyle italic flag. They should be the same.

OK: They are the same.'OS/2' fsSelection italic flag is False and 'head' macStyle italic flag is False.

Pass

Noto Sans Sinhala SemCond ExtBd Regular (NotoSansSinhalaUI-SemiCondensedExtraBold.ttf)

OS/2

Panose Normal

Because 'OS/2' fsSelection italic flag is False and 'head' macStyle italic flag is False the OS/2 panose array form flag should be a 'Normal' entry.

OK: 'OS/2' panose array form flag is a 'Normal' entry.

Pass

Noto Sans Sinhala SemCond ExtBd Regular (NotoSansSinhalaUI-SemiCondensedExtraBold.ttf)

STAT table

STAT table

Info

Noto Sans Sinhala SemCond Thin Regular (NotoSansSinhalaUI-SemiCondensedThin.ttf)

STAT

static font

Variable font must have a STAT table.

No check of STAT table for static fonts included, yet. Static fonts do not need to have a STAT table. It is only recommended by Microsoft, not required.
More infos here:
https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/typography/opentype/spec/stat

Info

Noto Sans Sinhala SemCond ExtLt Regular (NotoSansSinhalaUI-SemiCondensedExtraLight.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

Pass

Noto Sans Sinhala SemCond Thin Regular (NotoSansSinhalaUI-SemiCondensedThin.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'NotoSansSinhalaUI-SemiCondensedThin', Everything looks good.

Pass

'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'NotoSansSinhalaUI-SemiCondensedThin', Everything looks good.

Pass

Noto Sans Sinhala SemCond Thin Regular (NotoSansSinhalaUI-SemiCondensedThin.ttf)

name

MS NID 8/13

License text if Manufactur (NID 8) is one of these 'Monotype Imaging Inc.', 'Monotype Imaging Inc', 'Monotype ITC Inc.', 'Monotype Hong Kong Limited', 'Monotype Limited', 'Monotype KK', 'Monotype Solutions India Private Limited'

Please verify against job spec.
MS NID 13 is:
This Font Software is licensed under the SIL Open Font License, Version 1.1. This Font Software is distributed on an "AS IS" BASIS, WITHOUT WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS OF ANY KIND, either express or implied. See the SIL Open Font License for the specific language, permissions and limitations governing your use of this Font Software.
but should be:
This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. You can learn more about Monotype by clicking here: www.monotype.com.

Error

Pass

Noto Sans Sinhala SemCond Thin Regular (NotoSansSinhalaUI-SemiCondensedThin.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

If Typographic Family Name (NID 16) is present Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17) must contain a value (Windows Preferred).

OK: Font has both Typographic Family Name (NID 16) and Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17).

Critical

Noto Sans Sinhala SemCond Thin Regular (NotoSansSinhalaUI-SemiCondensedThin.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

MS NID 16 + NID 17 should match NID 1 (+2).
Otherwise cross platform compatibility does not work between Mac (uses NID 16+17) and Windows (uses NID 1+2). (Jan 2019)

(NID 16 + 'Space' + NID 17) 'Noto Sans Sinhala UI SemiCondensed Thin' ≠ 'Noto Sans Sinhala SemCond Thin' (NID 1).

Pass

name

MS NID 4

NID 4 length is '45' but shouldn't be longer than 31 characters.
'Noto Sans Sinhala UI SemiCondensed ExtraLight'

Warning

Error

Noto Sans Sinhala SemCond ExtLt Regular (NotoSansSinhalaUI-SemiCondensedExtraLight.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name length shouldn't be longer then 27.
(Otherwise it may cause issues in MS Word.)

NID 6 length is '41' but shouldn't be longer then 27 characters.
'NotoSansSinhalaUI-SemiCondensedExtraLight'

Pass

Noto Sans Sinhala SemCond ExtLt Regular (NotoSansSinhalaUI-SemiCondensedExtraLight.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'NotoSansSinhalaUI-SemiCondensedExtraLight', Everything looks good.

Pass

Noto Sans Sinhala SemCond ExtLt Regular (NotoSansSinhalaUI-SemiCondensedExtraLight.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'NotoSansSinhalaUI-SemiCondensedExtraLight', Everything looks good.

Pass

Noto Sans Sinhala SemCond ExtLt Regular (NotoSansSinhalaUI-SemiCondensedExtraLight.ttf)

name

MS NID 8/13

License text if Manufactur (NID 8) is one of these 'Monotype Imaging Inc.', 'Monotype Imaging Inc', 'Monotype ITC Inc.', 'Monotype Hong Kong Limited', 'Monotype Limited', 'Monotype KK', 'Monotype Solutions India Private Limited'

Please verify against job spec.
MS NID 13 is:
This Font Software is licensed under the SIL Open Font License, Version 1.1. This Font Software is distributed on an "AS IS" BASIS, WITHOUT WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS OF ANY KIND, either express or implied. See the SIL Open Font License for the specific language, permissions and limitations governing your use of this Font Software.
but should be:
This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. You can learn more about Monotype by clicking here: www.monotype.com.

Error

Noto Sans Sinhala SemCond ExtLt Regular (NotoSansSinhalaUI-SemiCondensedExtraLight.ttf)

name

MS NID 14

MS NID 14, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 14 is http://scripts.sil.org/OFL, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Pass

Noto Sans Sinhala SemCond ExtLt Regular (NotoSansSinhalaUI-SemiCondensedExtraLight.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

If Typographic Family Name (NID 16) is present Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17) must contain a value (Windows Preferred).

OK: Font has both Typographic Family Name (NID 16) and Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17).

Critical

Noto Sans Sinhala SemCond ExtLt Regular (NotoSansSinhalaUI-SemiCondensedExtraLight.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

MS NID 16 + NID 17 should match NID 1 (+2).
Otherwise cross platform compatibility does not work between Mac (uses NID 16+17) and Windows (uses NID 1+2). (Jan 2019)

(NID 16 + 'Space' + NID 17) 'Noto Sans Sinhala UI SemiCondensed ExtraLight' ≠ 'Noto Sans Sinhala SemCond ExtLt' (NID 1).

Pass

name

MS NID 0 (3, 1, 1033, 0)

MS NID 0 is 'Copyright 2016 Google Inc. All Rights Reserved.'

Noto Sans Sinhala SemCond Light Regular (NotoSansSinhalaUI-SemiCondensedLight.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name length shouldn't be longer then 27.
(Otherwise it may cause issues in MS Word.)

NID 6 length is '36' but shouldn't be longer then 27 characters.
'NotoSansSinhalaUI-SemiCondensedLight'

Pass

Noto Sans Sinhala SemCond Light Regular (NotoSansSinhalaUI-SemiCondensedLight.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'NotoSansSinhalaUI-SemiCondensedLight', Everything looks good.

Pass

Noto Sans Sinhala SemCond Light Regular (NotoSansSinhalaUI-SemiCondensedLight.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'NotoSansSinhalaUI-SemiCondensedLight', Everything looks good.

Pass

Noto Sans Sinhala SemCond Light Regular (NotoSansSinhalaUI-SemiCondensedLight.ttf)

name

MS NID 8/13

License text if Manufactur (NID 8) is one of these 'Monotype Imaging Inc.', 'Monotype Imaging Inc', 'Monotype ITC Inc.', 'Monotype Hong Kong Limited', 'Monotype Limited', 'Monotype KK', 'Monotype Solutions India Private Limited'

Please verify against job spec.
MS NID 13 is:
This Font Software is licensed under the SIL Open Font License, Version 1.1. This Font Software is distributed on an "AS IS" BASIS, WITHOUT WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS OF ANY KIND, either express or implied. See the SIL Open Font License for the specific language, permissions and limitations governing your use of this Font Software.
but should be:
This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. You can learn more about Monotype by clicking here: www.monotype.com.

Error

Noto Sans Sinhala SemCond Light Regular (NotoSansSinhalaUI-SemiCondensedLight.ttf)

name

MS NID 14

MS NID 14, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 14 is http://scripts.sil.org/OFL, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Pass

Noto Sans Sinhala SemCond Light Regular (NotoSansSinhalaUI-SemiCondensedLight.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

If Typographic Family Name (NID 16) is present Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17) must contain a value (Windows Preferred).

OK: Font has both Typographic Family Name (NID 16) and Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17).

Critical

Noto Sans Sinhala SemCond Light Regular (NotoSansSinhalaUI-SemiCondensedLight.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

MS NID 16 + NID 17 should match NID 1 (+2).
Otherwise cross platform compatibility does not work between Mac (uses NID 16+17) and Windows (uses NID 1+2). (Jan 2019)

(NID 16 + 'Space' + NID 17) 'Noto Sans Sinhala UI SemiCondensed Light' ≠ 'Noto Sans Sinhala SemCond Light' (NID 1).

Pass

Noto Sans Sinhala SemCond Regular (NotoSansSinhalaUI-SemiCondensed.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name length shouldn't be longer then 27.
(Otherwise it may cause issues in MS Word.)

NID 6 length is '31' but shouldn't be longer then 27 characters.
'NotoSansSinhalaUI-SemiCondensed'

Pass

Noto Sans Sinhala SemCond Regular (NotoSansSinhalaUI-SemiCondensed.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'NotoSansSinhalaUI-SemiCondensed', Everything looks good.

Pass

Noto Sans Sinhala SemCond Regular (NotoSansSinhalaUI-SemiCondensed.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'NotoSansSinhalaUI-SemiCondensed', Everything looks good.

Pass

Noto Sans Sinhala SemCond Regular (NotoSansSinhalaUI-SemiCondensed.ttf)

name

MS NID 8/13

License text if Manufactur (NID 8) is one of these 'Monotype Imaging Inc.', 'Monotype Imaging Inc', 'Monotype ITC Inc.', 'Monotype Hong Kong Limited', 'Monotype Limited', 'Monotype KK', 'Monotype Solutions India Private Limited'

Please verify against job spec.
MS NID 13 is:
This Font Software is licensed under the SIL Open Font License, Version 1.1. This Font Software is distributed on an "AS IS" BASIS, WITHOUT WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS OF ANY KIND, either express or implied. See the SIL Open Font License for the specific language, permissions and limitations governing your use of this Font Software.
but should be:
This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. You can learn more about Monotype by clicking here: www.monotype.com.

Error

Noto Sans Sinhala SemCond Regular (NotoSansSinhalaUI-SemiCondensed.ttf)

name

NID 14 is http://scripts.sil.org/OFL, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Pass

Noto Sans Sinhala SemCond Regular (NotoSansSinhalaUI-SemiCondensed.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

If Typographic Family Name (NID 16) is present Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17) must contain a value (Windows Preferred).

OK: Font has both Typographic Family Name (NID 16) and Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17).

Critical

Noto Sans Sinhala SemCond Regular (NotoSansSinhalaUI-SemiCondensed.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

MS NID 16 + NID 17 should match NID 1 (+2).
Otherwise cross platform compatibility does not work between Mac (uses NID 16+17) and Windows (uses NID 1+2). (Jan 2019)

(NID 16 + 'Space' + NID 17) 'Noto Sans Sinhala UI SemiCondensed' ≠ 'Noto Sans Sinhala SemCond' (NID 1).

Pass

Noto Sans Sinhala SemCond Med Regular (NotoSansSinhalaUI-SemiCondensedMedium.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'NotoSansSinhalaUI-SemiCondensedMedium', Everything looks good.

Pass

'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'NotoSansSinhalaUI-SemiCondensedMedium', Everything looks good.

Pass

Noto Sans Sinhala SemCond Med Regular (NotoSansSinhalaUI-SemiCondensedMedium.ttf)

name

MS NID 8/13

License text if Manufactur (NID 8) is one of these 'Monotype Imaging Inc.', 'Monotype Imaging Inc', 'Monotype ITC Inc.', 'Monotype Hong Kong Limited', 'Monotype Limited', 'Monotype KK', 'Monotype Solutions India Private Limited'

Please verify against job spec.
MS NID 13 is:
This Font Software is licensed under the SIL Open Font License, Version 1.1. This Font Software is distributed on an "AS IS" BASIS, WITHOUT WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS OF ANY KIND, either express or implied. See the SIL Open Font License for the specific language, permissions and limitations governing your use of this Font Software.
but should be:
This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. You can learn more about Monotype by clicking here: www.monotype.com.

Error

Noto Sans Sinhala SemCond Med Regular (NotoSansSinhalaUI-SemiCondensedMedium.ttf)

name

MS NID 14

MS NID 14, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 14 is http://scripts.sil.org/OFL, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Pass

Noto Sans Sinhala SemCond Med Regular (NotoSansSinhalaUI-SemiCondensedMedium.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

If Typographic Family Name (NID 16) is present Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17) must contain a value (Windows Preferred).

OK: Font has both Typographic Family Name (NID 16) and Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17).

Critical

Noto Sans Sinhala SemCond Med Regular (NotoSansSinhalaUI-SemiCondensedMedium.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

MS NID 16 + NID 17 should match NID 1 (+2).
Otherwise cross platform compatibility does not work between Mac (uses NID 16+17) and Windows (uses NID 1+2). (Jan 2019)

(NID 16 + 'Space' + NID 17) 'Noto Sans Sinhala UI SemiCondensed Medium' ≠ 'Noto Sans Sinhala SemCond Med' (NID 1).

Pass

Noto Sans Sinhala SemCond SemBd Regular (NotoSansSinhalaUI-SemiCondensedSemiBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name length shouldn't be longer then 27.
(Otherwise it may cause issues in MS Word.)

NID 6 length is '39' but shouldn't be longer then 27 characters.
'NotoSansSinhalaUI-SemiCondensedSemiBold'

Pass

Noto Sans Sinhala SemCond SemBd Regular (NotoSansSinhalaUI-SemiCondensedSemiBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'NotoSansSinhalaUI-SemiCondensedSemiBold', Everything looks good.

Pass

Noto Sans Sinhala SemCond SemBd Regular (NotoSansSinhalaUI-SemiCondensedSemiBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'NotoSansSinhalaUI-SemiCondensedSemiBold', Everything looks good.

Pass

NID 11 is http://www.google.com/get/noto/, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Noto Sans Sinhala SemCond SemBd Regular (NotoSansSinhalaUI-SemiCondensedSemiBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 12

MS NID 12, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 12 is http://www.monotype.com/studio, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Error

Noto Sans Sinhala SemCond SemBd Regular (NotoSansSinhalaUI-SemiCondensedSemiBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 8/13

License text if Manufactur (NID 8) is one of these 'Monotype Imaging Inc.', 'Monotype Imaging Inc', 'Monotype ITC Inc.', 'Monotype Hong Kong Limited', 'Monotype Limited', 'Monotype KK', 'Monotype Solutions India Private Limited'

Please verify against job spec.
MS NID 13 is:
This Font Software is licensed under the SIL Open Font License, Version 1.1. This Font Software is distributed on an "AS IS" BASIS, WITHOUT WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS OF ANY KIND, either express or implied. See the SIL Open Font License for the specific language, permissions and limitations governing your use of this Font Software.
but should be:
This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. You can learn more about Monotype by clicking here: www.monotype.com.

Error

Noto Sans Sinhala SemCond SemBd Regular (NotoSansSinhalaUI-SemiCondensedSemiBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 14

MS NID 14, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 14 is http://scripts.sil.org/OFL, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Pass

Noto Sans Sinhala SemCond SemBd Regular (NotoSansSinhalaUI-SemiCondensedSemiBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

If Typographic Family Name (NID 16) is present Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17) must contain a value (Windows Preferred).

OK: Font has both Typographic Family Name (NID 16) and Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17).

Critical

Noto Sans Sinhala SemCond SemBd Regular (NotoSansSinhalaUI-SemiCondensedSemiBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

MS NID 16 + NID 17 should match NID 1 (+2).
Otherwise cross platform compatibility does not work between Mac (uses NID 16+17) and Windows (uses NID 1+2). (Jan 2019)

(NID 16 + 'Space' + NID 17) 'Noto Sans Sinhala UI SemiCondensed SemiBold' ≠ 'Noto Sans Sinhala SemCond SemBd' (NID 1).

Pass

Noto Sans Sinhala SemCond Bold (NotoSansSinhalaUI-SemiCondensedBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name length shouldn't be longer then 27.
(Otherwise it may cause issues in MS Word.)

'NotoSansSinhalaUI-SemiCondensedBold'

Pass

Noto Sans Sinhala SemCond Bold (NotoSansSinhalaUI-SemiCondensedBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'NotoSansSinhalaUI-SemiCondensedBold', Everything looks good.

Pass

Noto Sans Sinhala SemCond Bold (NotoSansSinhalaUI-SemiCondensedBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'NotoSansSinhalaUI-SemiCondensedBold', Everything looks good.

Pass

Noto Sans Sinhala SemCond Bold (NotoSansSinhalaUI-SemiCondensedBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 8/13

Please verify against job spec.
MS NID 13 is:
This Font Software is licensed under the SIL Open Font License, Version 1.1. This Font Software is distributed on an "AS IS" BASIS, WITHOUT WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS OF ANY KIND, either express or implied. See the SIL Open Font License for the specific language, permissions and limitations governing your use of this Font Software.
but should be:
This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. You can learn more about Monotype by clicking here: www.monotype.com.

Error

Noto Sans Sinhala SemCond Bold (NotoSansSinhalaUI-SemiCondensedBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 14

MS NID 14, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 14 is http://scripts.sil.org/OFL, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Pass

Noto Sans Sinhala SemCond Bold (NotoSansSinhalaUI-SemiCondensedBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

If Typographic Family Name (NID 16) is present Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17) must contain a value (Windows Preferred).

OK: Font has both Typographic Family Name (NID 16) and Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17).

Critical

Noto Sans Sinhala SemCond Bold (NotoSansSinhalaUI-SemiCondensedBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

MS NID 16 + NID 17 should match NID 1 (+2).
Otherwise cross platform compatibility does not work between Mac (uses NID 16+17) and Windows (uses NID 1+2). (Jan 2019)

(NID 16 + 'Space' + NID 17) 'Noto Sans Sinhala UI SemiCondensed Bold' ≠ 'Noto Sans Sinhala SemCond Bold' (NID 1 + 'Space' + NID 2).

Pass

NID 16 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Book, Ultra, Normal'

Noto Sans Sinhala SemCond ExtBd Regular (NotoSansSinhalaUI-SemiCondensedExtraBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name length shouldn't be longer then 27.
(Otherwise it may cause issues in MS Word.)

NID 6 length is '40' but shouldn't be longer then 27 characters.
'NotoSansSinhalaUI-SemiCondensedExtraBold'

Pass

Noto Sans Sinhala SemCond ExtBd Regular (NotoSansSinhalaUI-SemiCondensedExtraBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'NotoSansSinhalaUI-SemiCondensedExtraBold', Everything looks good.

Pass

Noto Sans Sinhala SemCond ExtBd Regular (NotoSansSinhalaUI-SemiCondensedExtraBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'NotoSansSinhalaUI-SemiCondensedExtraBold', Everything looks good.

Pass

Noto Sans Sinhala SemCond ExtBd Regular (NotoSansSinhalaUI-SemiCondensedExtraBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 8/13

License text if Manufactur (NID 8) is one of these 'Monotype Imaging Inc.', 'Monotype Imaging Inc', 'Monotype ITC Inc.', 'Monotype Hong Kong Limited', 'Monotype Limited', 'Monotype KK', 'Monotype Solutions India Private Limited'

Please verify against job spec.
MS NID 13 is:
This Font Software is licensed under the SIL Open Font License, Version 1.1. This Font Software is distributed on an "AS IS" BASIS, WITHOUT WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS OF ANY KIND, either express or implied. See the SIL Open Font License for the specific language, permissions and limitations governing your use of this Font Software.
but should be:
This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. You can learn more about Monotype by clicking here: www.monotype.com.

Error

name

NID 14 is http://scripts.sil.org/OFL, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Noto Sans Sinhala SemCond ExtBd Regular (NotoSansSinhalaUI-SemiCondensedExtraBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

If Typographic Family Name (NID 16) is present Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17) must contain a value (Windows Preferred).

OK: Font has both Typographic Family Name (NID 16) and Typographic Subfamily Name (NID 17).

Critical

Noto Sans Sinhala SemCond ExtBd Regular (NotoSansSinhalaUI-SemiCondensedExtraBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 16/17

MS NID 16 + NID 17 should match NID 1 (+2).
Otherwise cross platform compatibility does not work between Mac (uses NID 16+17) and Windows (uses NID 1+2). (Jan 2019)

(NID 16 + 'Space' + NID 17) 'Noto Sans Sinhala UI SemiCondensed ExtraBold' ≠ 'Noto Sans Sinhala SemCond ExtBd' (NID 1).

Pass

Noto Sans Sinhala SemCond ExtBd Regular (NotoSansSinhalaUI-SemiCondensedExtraBold.ttf)

name

MS NID 16

Reserved word used in Typographic Family Name NID16 and not allowed in Microsoft Office applications.

NID 16 does not contain any of the following keywords: 'Book, Ultra, Normal'

Pass

name

MS NID 16

Check Width Names Typographic Family Name NID16

Noto Sans Sinhala SemCond Blk Regular (NotoSansSinhalaUI-SemiCondensedBlack.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name length shouldn't be longer then 27.

'NotoSansSinhalaUI-SemiCondensedBlack'

Pass

Noto Sans Sinhala SemCond Blk Regular (NotoSansSinhalaUI-SemiCondensedBlack.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
Monotype uses NID 6 for creating CSS classes for their demo HTML. The following characters cause issues in the CSS code: '
, , , &, _, [, ], (, ), {, }, <, >, /, \, %'

NID 6 is 'NotoSansSinhalaUI-SemiCondensedBlack', Everything looks good.

Pass

Noto Sans Sinhala SemCond Blk Regular (NotoSansSinhalaUI-SemiCondensedBlack.ttf)

name

MS NID 6

MS NID 6, PostScript Name check for illegal characters.
'space' in NID 6 cause issues in fontbook for Mac.

NID 6 is 'NotoSansSinhalaUI-SemiCondensedBlack', Everything looks good.

Pass

Noto Sans Sinhala SemCond Blk Regular (NotoSansSinhalaUI-SemiCondensedBlack.ttf)

name

MS NID 8/13

License text if Manufactur (NID 8) is one of these 'Monotype Imaging Inc.', 'Monotype Imaging Inc', 'Monotype ITC Inc.', 'Monotype Hong Kong Limited', 'Monotype Limited', 'Monotype KK', 'Monotype Solutions India Private Limited'

Please verify against job spec.
MS NID 13 is:
This Font Software is licensed under the SIL Open Font License, Version 1.1. This Font Software is distributed on an "AS IS" BASIS, WITHOUT WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS OF ANY KIND, either express or implied. See the SIL Open Font License for the specific language, permissions and limitations governing your use of this Font Software.
but should be:
This font software is the property of Monotype Imaging Inc., or one of its affiliated entities (collectively, Monotype) and its use by you is covered under the terms of a license agreement. You have obtained this font software either directly from Monotype or together with software distributed by one of the licensees of Monotype. This software is a valuable asset of Monotype. Unless you have entered into a specific license agreement granting you additional rights, your use of this software is limited by the terms of the actual license agreement you have entered into with Monotype. You may not copy or distribute this software. If you have any questions concerning your rights you should review the license agreement you received with the software. You can learn more about Monotype by clicking here: www.monotype.com.

Error

Noto Sans Sinhala SemCond Blk Regular (NotoSansSinhalaUI-SemiCondensedBlack.ttf)

name

MS NID 14

MS NID 14, URL Vendor should be 'http://www.monotype.com'.

NID 14 is http://scripts.sil.org/OFL, but should be http://www.monotype.com. Please verify against job spec.

Pass

Critical

MS NID 16 + NID 17 should match NID 1 (+2).
Otherwise cross platform compatibility does not work between Mac (uses NID 16+17) and Windows (uses NID 1+2). (Jan 2019)

(NID 16 + 'Space' + NID 17) 'Noto Sans Sinhala UI SemiCondensed Black' ≠ 'Noto Sans Sinhala SemCond Blk' (NID 1).

The width name should be before weight name. NID 16 is correct: 'Noto Sans Sinhala UI'

Pass

kern

GPOS table does not have kerning feature. Please investigate if this meets requirements.

The result of sTypoAscender – sTypoDescender (1362) match or exceed the unitsPerEm value (1000).

Every PostScript name is fine.
